name: In the knock of time
description:
Game description: 

Student Layla Fairuz is nothing short of a slacker. Though when she takes a nap in Ms Taylor's history class she finds herself in the middle of the desert lost in time and space.

This was a solo project that I coded in a month before Ramadan began. The game includes mini-games, puzzles and educational fact cards about historical periods. It is also a choice driven game.
